Uses of Class
com.samskivert.util.Calendars.Builder

Packages that use Calendars.Builder
com.samskivert.util Provides a variety of utility services including data structures, synchronization support, text processing and more. 
 

Uses of Calendars.Builder in com.samskivert.util
 

Methods in com.samskivert.util that return Calendars.Builder

          Adds the specified value to the Calendar.DATE field.

static Calendars.Builder Calendars.at(Date when)
          Returns a fluent wrapper around a calendar configured with the specified time.
static Calendars.Builder Calendars.at(int year, int month, int day)
          Returns a fluent wrapper around a calendar configured to zero milliseconds after midnight on the specified day in the specified month and year.
 Calendars.Builder Calendars.Builder.at(int year, int month, int day)
          Sets the time to zero milliseconds after midnight on the specified year, month and day.
static Calendars.Builder Calendars.at(long millis)
          Returns a fluent wrapper around a calendar configured with the specified time.

          See Calendar.setTimeZone(TimeZone).

          Returns a fluent wrapper around a calendar for the specifed time zone and locale.
static Calendars.Builder Calendars.now()

static Calendars.Builder Calendars.with(Calendar calendar)

static Calendars.Builder Calendars.withCopy(Calendar calendar)
          Returns a fluent wrapper around a clone of the supplied calendar.
 Calendars.Builder Calendars.Builder.zeroTime()
          Zeros out the time fields of this calendar, preserving only the date.
